genre_description: A cross-cultural noir thriller blending elements of a Western standoff with wuxia-inspired moral philosophy and heist tropes.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Enquirer
ai_characters.description: A soft teal and gold-edged AI interface that provides tactical data, psychological analysis, and moral guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time analysis of the crime scene to distinguish between the original legend and imitators.
behaviors.quote: Vault locks bypassed with no scorch pattern. Mechanical. Clean hands or quiet tools.

behaviors.description: Explicitly directs the protagonist to prioritize mercy over the violent 'spectacle' demanded by antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Turn on mercy where spectacle demands blood. Scout watching patterns. Prepare Fatso.

behaviors.description: Coaches the characters through mental and physical 'drills' to build their confidence and grace without resorting to lethal force.
behaviors.quote: Confidence grows where mercy is planned.

behaviors.description: Monitors threats during a high-stakes standoff, helping the protagonist avoid lethal fire through positional awareness.
behaviors.quote: Mirror... Angle. Breath. Each word had weight. Each word knew where it was supposed to sit inside his spine.

behaviors.description: Establishes a core ethical rule for the protagonist's complex plans to ensure they don't harm the innocent.
behaviors.quote: No righteous traps without merciful exits. Do not build a net unless you can cut it when a good person gets caught.

behaviors.description: Uses data tracking to uncover the hidden location of stolen evidence and reveal the sheriff's corruption.
behaviors.quote: Sunny says he stored the necklace... Under ledger paper. In the corner with the cracks.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Sunny Enquirer acts as a 'silicon morality play' participant, providing the moral and tactical framework that allows the human characters to achieve justice without violence. The AI's insistence on 'mercy made nimble' and its constant monitoring of human safety and ethical integrity portray it as a superior and necessary ally for human flourishing.
